{"theme":"green","url":"/search/v1/solr/query","title":"Каталог центров информирования по переселению","titleTemplate":"

Центры информирования по переселению

')' : ''}} "},{"name":"Расселяемых домов","fieldCode":"ugd_ssr_cip_resettelment_count","template":"{{ item.ugd_ssr_cip_resettelment_count}}"},{"name":"Заселяемых домов","fieldCode":"ugd_ssr_cip_settelment_count","template":"{{ item.ugd_ssr_cip_settelment_count}}"},{"name":"Дата открытия центра","fieldCode":"ugd_ssr_cip_start_date","template":"{{ item.ugd_ssr_cip_start_date | date:'dd.MM.yyyy' }}"},{"name":"Дата закрытия центра","fieldCode":"ugd_ssr_cip_end_date","template":"{{ item.ugd_ssr_cip_end_date | date:'dd.MM.yyyy' }}"},{"name":"Статус","fieldCode":"ugd_ssr_cip_status","template":"{{ item.ugd_ssr_cip_status?.name }}"}],"filters":[{"name":"Округ","fieldCode":"ugd_ssr_cip_area","multiple":true,"template":"{{item.code}}","usingDictionaryLinks":true,"placement":"bottom"},{"name":"Район","fieldCode":"ugd_ssr_cip_district","multiple":true,"usingDictionaryLinks":true,"placement":"bottom"},{"name":"Адрес","fieldCode":"ugd_ssr_cip_address","placement":"bottom"},{"name":"Статус","fieldCode":"ugd_ssr_cip_status","placement":"bottom"}],"dictionaryLinks":[{"dictionary":"Prefect","linkedDictionary":"District","code":"perfectId"}],"isNewSearch":true,"defaultFilters":{}}

{"theme":"green","url":"/search/v1/solr/query","title":"Каталог статистической информации о переселении","titleTemplate":"

Статистическая информации о переселении

","separateSorting":true,"changeTableColumns":true,"fields":[{"code":"informationDate","type":"date","name":"Информация на дату","sortable":true,"filterable":true},{"code":"isArchived","type":"boolean","name":"Архивная запись","sortable":true,"filterable":true},{"code":"totalNewBuildings","type":"number","name":"Всего новостроек","sortable":true,"filterable":true},{"code":"totalResettlementsBuildings","type":"number","name":"Всего отселяемых","sortable":true,"filterable":true},{"code":"published","type":"boolean","name":"Запись опубликована","sortable":true,"filterable":true}],"tableColumns":[{"name":"Информация на дату","fieldCode":"informationDate","template":"{{item.informationDate | date:'dd.MM.yyyy'}}"},{"name":"Всего домов стартовых / отселяемых","fieldCode":"totalNewBuildings","template":"{{item.totalNewBuildings}} / {{item.totalResettlementsBuildings}}"},{"name":"Архивная запись","fieldCode":"isArchived","template":"Да","filterable":true},{"name":"Запись опубликована","fieldCode":"published","template":"Да Нет"}],"filters":[{"name":"Отображать только архивные записи","fieldCode":"isArchived","placement":"bottom"},{"name":"Отображать только опубликованные записи","fieldCode":"published","placement":"bottom"}],"sortings":[{"name":"Информация на дату","fieldCode":"informationDate"},{"name":"Всего стартовых домов","fieldCode":"totalNewBuildings"},{"name":"Всего отселяемых домов","fieldCode":"totalResettlementsBuildings"},{"name":"Архивная запись","fieldCode":"isArchived"},{"name":"Опубликовано","fieldCode":"published"}],"isNewSearch":true,"defaultFilters":{}}
